text: shadow is a mobile application to help
you remember and record your dreams and
we believe that ninety-five percent of
all dreams are forgotten in the first
five minutes of waking up last night I
had a dream about Japan my mother was a
modern alarm clocks destroy dreams
because they rip you through what's
called your hypnopompic sleep state
which is a state between sleeping and
waking and the idea is that you have to
come through this state slowly so we do
an escalated alarm and when you turn the
alarm off you can speak or text your
dream into the application sometimes I
dream about my dog and my children dream
about them as well because they're none
of them are home anymore enough the
dreams that i remember is um climbing
the mountain with a lot of us know and
it's a feeling of freedom at the top of
the mountain you could effectively write
down all your dreams but then it won't
become digital and the idea is like now
you can say okay dream journal tomy all
my dreams I had about my mother in the
last year show me all the dreams I had
about my mother and a red car what if
you're you're in a place and I go I
dreamt about this and you could search a
dream journal and say oh yeah actually I
did I dreamt about it three years ago
the idea is that if you want to make a
dream public and share it with with the
rest of the community then we encourage
it but we're also very strict on data
privacy if people share their dreams
with people that they don't know or
people that they know very slightly they
may be betraying things about themselves
that they don't understand many people
will tell their dreams and not know what
they're telling about
one I had as a kid was somebody large
running at me into my bedroom if we
could really create as positive for
future generations to come back and look
at this database and say what were
people dreaming that in two thousand
fourteen fifteen sixteen seventeen and
then map kind of the emotional state of
the world in real time it could become
the ultimate marketing tool not only to
understand the national consciousness
but perhaps the national unconsciousness
people don't know what the function of
dreaming is and we feel like explorers
we feel like we're going to the moon but
i guess the difference between us in in
other explorers is we're going to put a
webcam on our spaceship and allow the
community to come and can watch and see
what's happening
